H0.text: By which other name is the metallic element Potassium also known, hence its chemical formula K. Kalium

H1.text: By which other name is the metallic element Potassium also known, hence its chemical formula K. Potas

H2.text: By which other name is the metallic element Potassium also known, hence its chemical formula K. Kalon

H3.text: By which other name is the metallic element Potassium also known, hence its chemical formula K. KALLIUM

A4.text: In 1809, Ludwig Wilhelm Gilbert proposed the name Kalium for Davy's 'potassium'.

A5.text: In 1814, the Swedish chemist Berzelius advocated the name kalium for potassium, with the chemical symbol K.
